entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
